question: Which of the following statement is correct about ‘privy purse’?
option1: A purse given privately by one organisation to another
option2: A purse given by the Government of India to dignitaries for services rendered
option3: A grant given by the Government of India to the erstwhile Prince of India
option4: A gift given by an erstwhile Prince of india to the Government of India
answer: A grant given by the Government of India to the erstwhile Prince of India
explanation: The Privy Purse was created as part of the agreements made by the erstwhile princess to merge with the Union of India in the year 1947. Privy Purse was a payment that was made to the royal families of the former princely states of India.
